evs4j
Class ConnectionDecorator

java.lang.Object
  evs4j.ConnectionDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection, Listener
public abstract class ConnectionDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connection, Listener

Useful for implementing chains of connections. Subclasses have to implement at least the send() and onMessage methods.

Field Summary
protected  Connection conn
           
protected  Listener listener

          Constructs a ConnectionDecorator around an underlying Connection.

setListener

public void setListener(Listener listener)
Description copied from interface: Connection
Sets the Listener to which the connection will pass asynchronous events, such as incoming messages and installed configurations. This method must be called before open() or some messages may be missed.

Specified by:
setListener in interface Connection
